channel.title: Transform your observation data on Sensu Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Transform your observation data on Sensu Docs

item.title: Mutators reference
item.description: Sensu executes mutators during the transform stage of the observability pipeline. Pipelines can specify a mutator to execute and transform observability event data before any handlers are applied. When the Sensu backend processes an event, it checks the pipeline for the presence of a mutator and executes that mutator before executing the handler. Mutators accept input/data via stdin and can parse JSON event data. They output JSON data (modified event data) to stdout or stderr.
